ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Phone_Number__c == "." || Phone_Number__c = "TBC" || Phone_Number__c = "TBD" || Phone_Number__c = "tbc" || Phone_Number__c = "tbd" || Phone_Number__c = "N/A" || Phone_Number__c == "Already Set Up" || Phone_Number__c == "already set up" || Phone_Number__c == "unknown" || Phone_Number__c = "n/a"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the phone number. Data quality is important
